backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing adding carry-2.png to PosterPage and its related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files providing an overview of structure, routing, and themed UI pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style overrides defining a light/dark OKLCH color system with copper-themed variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the main React module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all site routes and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper with navigation, page outlet, and footer, hiding nav/footer on the intro page.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus and active‑route highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context provider and hook handling auth client creation, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base theme with updated darker copper/bronze OKLCH variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that mounts React, sets up QueryClient, and wraps the app with identity/auth providers.
frontend/src/pages/BlankPage.tsx: Intentional placeholder page that renders nothing.
frontend/src/pages/DivisionsPage.tsx: Displays detailed cards describing the Brotherhood’s divisions with images and themed lore text.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Defines a structured set of lore-based history sections for Texhoma and the Copper Age, rendered with cards and formatted content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with a hero banner and feature cards linking to major site sections like ranks, lore, and divisions.
frontend/src/pages/IntroPage.tsx: Intro splash screen with a background image and a button that navigates to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and a card displaying images of T-10 power armor and accessories.
frontend/src/pages/PosterPage.tsx: Renders a simple poster showcase with a hero header and a single recruitment-style image.
frontend/src/pages/RanksPage.tsx: Renders hierarchical rank information for the Brotherhood using themed cards and structured sections.
frontend/src/pages/UniformArmorVariantsB: React page rendering styled sections describing armor and uniform variants by rank using cards, icons, and Tailwind styling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and shadows, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata file tracking project state, features, and pending requests for a project showing an uploaded image on the Posters page.
